normalized: the full scale of the ritual fills my eyes.
it was in a vast atrium about 20 meters wide by 3 stories tall.
a forest of tanks filled with specimens suspended in mysterious fluid stood in rows and thick electrical cables crawl everywhere along the floor.
medical device-looking things and various machines used for tests and who knows what else surrounded them, their lights blinking on and off.
in the center of all of this stood barde barde.
he's got the philosopher's stone he stole from aishe in hand, awaiting our arrival.
the werewolf is next to him, and there's no sign of miki anywhere.
and behind barde, as if being swallowed up by the machinery in the wall with her legs spread to the extreme, hung michiko's pitiful form.
i saw her lips feebly make out "i'm sorry" in response to annerose's screams before she slumped over.
a hazy, black snake-looking thing was beginning to coil around michiko as she remained unconscious.
that's all my heightened immortal senses could pick up within the first few seconds of our arrival.

name: barde
normalized: you're too late, steel witch!
fuhahahahaha!
barde laughs triumphantly.

name: annerose
normalized: baarde!
annerose launches herself forward in a fit of rage.

name: barde
normalized: fools can sit and watch!
with a sweep of his hand, several zombies emerge from the shadows alongside miki to block our path.

name: rikurou
normalized: miki!?
her eyes are empty, just like before.

name: miki
normalized: please don't interfere.
for our sake.
she says in a voice devoid of human emotion, like it's been crafted by a machine.

name: rikurou
normalized: for our sake!?
is this what you really wanted, miki!?
you know it's not!
miki's response was a sweep of her machine gun without a moment's hesitation.

name: rikurou
normalized: miki…!

name: annerose
normalized: tch…!
annerose and i swiftly jump back.
a hailstorm of bullets rains down where we'd been standing not a second ago.
they vaporize where they struck with a nasty sound like a drop of water sizzling on a hot pan.

name: annerose
normalized: damn that barde, he's charged miki's bullets with magical energy.

name: barde
normalized: haha, careful now.
not even witches and immortals can shrug off one of those.
i'd do what i've been told and watch quietly if i were you.
as barde speaks, he begins chanting a spell with words i'venever heard before.

name: annerose
normalized: kh… it's begun!?
annerose looks at barde in shock.
the philosopher's stone in his hand is steadily glowing brighter and brighter.
and as if acting in response, the black snake surrounding michiko grows thicker and more distinct.
no, that's not right.
that black snake is actually welling up straight out of her.
and before long, michiko starts quietly fading away in the coils of the dark serpent.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!
michiko's in trouble!

name: annerose
normalized: i know!
that black dragon's michiko's true form!
this is bad, we're out of time!
anxiety fills annerose's expression for the first time.
but it only lasts a second before it vanishes.
she then turns and lines up miki.

name: rikurou
normalized: (she's going to kill her!
she's going to kill miki!

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!

name: annerose
normalized: don't you get it!?
she's barde's puppet!
the last dregs of a shackled soul.
setting her soul free's for her own good!
you of all people should understand that!

name: rikurou
normalized: but…!
annerose only sends a glance my way, then rockets toward miki the next second.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah!
annerose…!
did i want to stop her?
did i want to find some other way to save miki?
even i don't know the answer as i chase after her.

name: miki
normalized: i won't let you interfere.
miki levels her gun at us, and the wall of zombie assassins rush forward en masse to protect her.

name: annerose
normalized: out of my way!
annerose cuts down two of the approaching zombies and quickly closes the distance between her and miki.
and, swinging kongo yasha…
brings it down on miki's neck.
at that moment--

name: miki
normalized: miss annerose!
miki's expression turned friendly.
the look we knew so well from her.
annerose's blade instantly stops.
her heart had wavered for a moment.
two zombie assassins bear down on her, taking advantage of that opening.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose, watch out!
i jump at the one coming down on annerose from above and smash it face first into the ground.

name: annerose
normalized: …hah!
a second later, annerose takes a huge leap back.

name: annerose
normalized: tch…!
she bats away the steel claws reaching for her heart with kongo yasha and splits the assassin in half diagonally with the return stroke.
but her forearm was wet with blood like she hadn't completely avoided the attack.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!

name: annerose
normalized: it's just a scratch… huh, i've still got a ways to go if a puppet's smile's enough to make me hesitate.
annerose gives herself a self-depricating smile and hoists kongo yasha once more.
but i can sense the reluctance in her blade.

name: rikurou
normalized: (annerose isn't sure about this, either.
miki is a being created by barde.
the real miki is already long dead.
this is just something that's being forced to live and be used.
even so, annerose still can't bring herself to do what must be done.
it's the same for me.
even if there's no other way, perhaps, somewhere within her smile, the real miki lives on.
that's why i can't let go.

name: rikurou
normalized: (no, that's why we have to…!
the events of that night rekindle in the back of my mind.

name: miki
normalized: i… want to be strong, too…"

name: miki
normalized: not the strength you get from someone else, but the strength to be me.
that kind of strength.

name: rikurou
normalized: (miki, i…)
must i become a "demon?
to keep miki herself.
to keep the real miki from suffering any longer.
to let miki rest in peace.
i have to become a "demon!
that's why…!

name: rikurou
normalized: i'll…!
i unleash all of my immortal power.
but that's when the ritual underwent a dramatic change.
a blinding light spread in every direction from the center of the room.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha… what the!?

name: annerose
normalized: tch, he's too fast!
annerose glares at barde.
the philosopher's stone.
it shines blindingly in his hand like a second sun.

name: barde
normalized: fuhahahahahaha!
it begins!
at long last it begins!
barde slowly lifts the philosopher's stone on high with booming laughter.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah…!?
the philosopher's stone floats toward michiko like it's being carried along by invisible hands.
it's swiftly absorbed into her body, now almost completely enveloped by the black dragon.

name: rikurou
normalized: michiko!
as soon as i scream, explosive lightning and galeforce winds come shooting out from around her.

name: rikurou
normalized: gwah…!

name: annerose
normalized: kuh…!
the raging gale blasts away not only me and annerose, but the zombie assassins as well.
the only ones left standing are barde, miki nestled up next to him, and the werewolf who for some reason still hasn't moved a muscle.

name: barde
normalized: with fleuretty, one of the six superior spirits as your vessel, appear now before me, gate to the otherworld!
barde screams with his hands raised to the heavens.

name: rikurou
normalized: no…!
michiko!
in the center of the lightning and raging gale, michiko was losing her "human" form.
the "human" shell called michiko fleuretty was crumbling away to reveal a coiled, black dragon.
that's michiko's true form.
fleuretty, the devil from the otherworld.
then, the dark dragon opened its maw.
darkness becomes a roar and spills forth.
a bottomless abyss spreads from around the black dragon, swallowing even itself up in the pooling dark.
the darkness fuses with the dragon and becomes a sphere that repeatedly expands and contracts like a heart.
those pulsings grow faster and faster before suddenly sucking into a singularity.
then, where there was once darkness twists.
soundlessly, without light.
oozing from the distortion, a massive gate appears.
the gate connecting the human world and otherworld.

name: barde
normalized: ohh!
this is it!
the gate to the otherworld!
barde howls in jubilation.
michiko is nowhere to be seen.
there's only this gate that seems almost removed from reality.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose… michiko's…"
we didn't make it.
we couldn't save her.

name: annerose
normalized: here it comes, get down!

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…?

name: annerose
normalized: it's opening!
the gate was opened.
the gate to another dimension.
dark shapes burst forth from the other side.
hands.
countless dark hands appear, reaching out into our world.

name: rikurou
normalized: wh-what are those things!?
icy-cold shivers of instinctive malaise and fear race up my spine.
i didn't have to know what they were to know they spelled terror.

name: annerose
normalized: it's the gatekeeper of hell!

name: rikurou
normalized: the gatekeeper of hell!?

name: annerose
normalized: i don't know how it works but there's a gatekeeper that steals souls in the gap between dimensions!
it's why you need some kind of sacrifice when you summon a devil!

name: annerose
normalized: and the price for safe passage through the gate is… it couldn't be!
annerose gulps in shock.
she's looking at the werewolf.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!
the werewolf!
the dark hands spilling forth from the gap between dimensions.
the werewolf takes them head on as if to protect barde from their clutches.

name: werewolf
normalized: gyaooww!
they swarm upon the howling werewolf.
they pierce its massive frame one after another, retreating back into the gate with the glowing orbs ripped from itsbody.

name: rikurou
normalized: (those are…!
the souls of the people the werewolf killed!?

name: barde
normalized: fuhahaha!
have your fill of the souls of amidahara!
barde's roar of joy all but confirms my hunch.
so that's it, i knew it!

name: rikurou
normalized: that's the 'toll!
i remember what barde said back then.

name: annerose
normalized: he had the werewolf gather up souls to keep himself safe when he opened the gate!
annerose spat.

name: rikurou
normalized: damn!
he got miki's brother and everyone from amidahara involved just for that!?

name: werewolf
normalized: grr… grrhh… gr… r…"
the werewolf's growls are getting weaker and weaker as the souls get carried off by the dark hands.
it's not just the souls of amidahara they're taking, but the werewolf's as well.
now, with every last soul consumed, the werewolf -- the man once called eiichi otonashi, disappears from this world.
and then…
the dark hands go flying for miki next.
if miki's soul is sealed within that human-shaped container…
then she, too, must look like a succulent feast to the hands as well.
but--

name: rikurou
normalized: that's not gonna happen!
like hell i'm going to let miki's soul be chicken feed for these bastards from the otherworld.
like hell i'll let them steal the peace her soul deserves.
that's why… i'll do it before that happens.
i'll take miki's soul.
and set her free.

name: rikurou
normalized: miki!

name: miki
normalized: yes!
i thought i heard a voice.
miki's voice.
maybe i was just hearing things.
but that doesn't stop me.
from believing that this is what miki wants.
goodbye, miki.
i'm sorry this is all i can do for you.
so please, at least rest in peace.

name: rikurou
normalized: i'll…!

name: annerose
normalized: you're not ready for that, rick.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…!?
just before i swung my fist, annerose instantly slipped in between us.

name: annerose
normalized: miki, i'll see you on the other side.
kongo yasha flashes.
there's hardly any blood.
i cradle miki's falling body.
she looks just like she's sleeping peacefully.
i gently lay her on the floor.

name: rikurou
normalized: …annerose.

name: annerose
normalized: it's my job to shoulder evil.

name: rikurou
normalized: i know…"

normalized: baarde!

i roar with fury as well.
and we simultaneously plunge in.

normalized: you dare oppose me you miserable insects!

his eyes are filled with an evil light.
n-no… this is…!?
i can't move!?

name: rikurou
normalized: ggh…"
i couldn't tear myself away from his gaze the moment his eyes emitted that strange light.
and that's not the only thing either.
my entire body, fueled by the full strength of my immortal power is completely paralyzed.

name: annerose
normalized: kh… using the oldest trick in the book…!
annerose has kongo yasha pointed right at barde's eyes and had withstood his gaze.
she's not completely paralyzed like me, but it looks like it's tough for her to take even a single step.

name: barde
normalized: foolish witch and servant.
your lowly souls shall also join in the sacrifice!

the dark hands then erupt from the gate once more and shoot straight for her.

name: annerose
normalized: tch…!
annerose falls back.
she's managing to dodge the dark hands coming from all directions, but the paralysis is slowing her down.
it's only a matter of time before they catch her.

name: rikurou
normalized: gwaahh!

normalized: (move!
come on body, moove!
okay… i've got my hands moving.
my legs work, too.
just a little more.
just a little more and i can protect annerose!

normalized: there's no place here for soulless husks!

tentacles shoot out like a rain of arrows and pierce me all over.

name: rikurou
normalized: guhah!
i'm summarily blown away and impaled against the wall.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!

name: annerose
normalized: don't you underestimate me!

the dark hands aiming for annerose suddenly veer off course and swarm upon kongo yasha's blade.

name: annerose
normalized: ggh… kuh… ngh…"
annerose looks like she's in pain.
kongo yasha should have defended her from the dark hands, but it almost seems like her soul's the one being consumed.
no, that's not it.
kongo yasha quivers like it's screaming.
the threads of magical energy that protect its master with an ironclad defense are ripping to shreds and cracks are forming in its guard.
the blade that can fell any foe is chipping away, and even its shine is fading.
those dark hands are feasting upon kongo yasha's magical energy.

name: annerose
normalized: you did well, kongo yasha.
annerose somehow survived the dark hands' fearsome assault.
however, kongo yasha had been gravely damaged in theprocess.

our situation is absolutely dire.
annerose and kongo yasha are both in rough shape.
i'm sitting here impaled and can't move an inch.

name: rikurou

normalized: you survived by having only your magical energy absorbed.
rejoice.

normalized: and how do you intend to fight with that rusted hunk of scrap metal?
become my servant and i may yet let you live, steel witch.

name: annerose
normalized: you're a hundred years too early to even think of asking that, cocksucker.

normalized: witches truly are a foolish breed.

' i've seen your tricks.

normalized: wha…!?
